WITH AGE_GROUP AS ( SELECT '10' LABEL FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '20' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '30' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '40' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '50' FROM DUAL ) SELECT
NVL(COUNT(M.BIRTH), 0) AS cnt FROM AGE_GROUP G LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON ( CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, M.BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 0 AND 19 THEN '10' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, M.BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, M.BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30' WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, M.BIRTH) / 12) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40' ELSE '50' END = G.LABEL ) GROUP BY G.LABEL ORDER BY G.LABEL
